Name: Deep Cave
About the game: Deep Cave is a roguelike game about the adventures of a brave dwarf in search of great riches. Go down to the deepest floors of the underworld, get more and more expensive minerals and craft improved equipment from them, defeat dangerous spiders, golems, underground worms and ghosts, become the hero of these dark caves!
